amendment.description: To enhance Federal Trade Commission enforcement against cross-border fraud and deception and other consumer protection law violations.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3662 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3662 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator McCain. (consideration: CR S9321) To enhance Federal Trade Commission enforcement against cross-border fraud and deception and other consumer protection law violations.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3662 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3662 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator McCain.
